collectors.titleDetails: (18 total Queries, 18 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>1. Update the permanent file to include new or varied bank mandates, bank accounts and signatories. </p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>2. Obtain a schedule of all bank and cash balances. <strong>(P)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>3. Agree totals shown on the lead schedule to the trial balance. <strong>(E)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>4. Agree comparative figures to the previous period’s statutory financial statements. <strong>(D, V)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>5. Review cash and bank balances for reasonableness and consistency. <strong>(C & E)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>6. Revisit the risk assessment, materiality calculation and assignment plan and update as appropriate where matters have been identified during the assignment.</p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>7. Ensure key findings from this section are included in the draft letter of representation, points for the management letter and points for A.E.P.’s attention.</p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>8. Ensure that the conclusion is appropriate. <strong>(P)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>9. Ensure that outstanding cheques and lodgements shown on bank reconciliations have cleared shortly after the period-end. <strong>(V, E)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>10. Where bank accounts have both credit and debit balances relating to the same financial institution, consider and justify whether these figures should be ‘netted off’ or shown gross. <strong>(V)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>11. Obtain a bank letter from each bank with which the client has had a relationship during the period. Agree the account balances and ensure all other matters arising are dealt with. <strong>(P, R & O, E, C, V)</strong></p>\r\n', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>12. Review the cash book and the bank statements around the period-end to ensure that any transfers etc. have been properly reflected in the financial statements. <strong>(C)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>13. Review the cash book and bank statements for the period for any unusual receipts or payments. <strong>(E, V)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>14. Ensure that any foreign currency balances at the period end have been correctly translated at the period end rate, and ensure there is an adequate accounting policy note. <strong>(V, P)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>15. Count petty cash balances and agree to the control account. <strong>(V, C)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>16. Obtain written confirmation of material petty cash floats held. <strong>(V)</strong></p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>17. List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>', '', '', '', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '24', 'Active', '2024-04-02 18:12:01')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p>1.	Update the permanent file to include new or varied bank mandates, bank accounts and signatories. </p>
    [1] => <p>2.	Obtain a schedule of all bank and cash balances. <strong>(P)</strong></p>
    [2] => <p>3.	Agree totals shown on the lead schedule to the trial balance. <strong>(E)</strong></p>
    [3] => <p>4.	Agree comparative figures to the previous period’s statutory financial statements. <strong>(D, V)</strong></p>
    [4] => <p>5.	Review cash and bank balances for reasonableness and consistency. <strong>(C & E)</strong></p>
    [5] => <p>6.	Revisit the risk assessment, materiality calculation and assignment plan and update as appropriate where matters have been identified during the assignment.</p>
    [6] => <p>7.	Ensure key findings from this section are included in the draft letter of representation, points for the management letter and points for A.E.P.’s attention.</p>
    [7] => <p>8.	Ensure that the conclusion is appropriate. <strong>(P)</strong></p>
    [8] => <p>9.	Ensure that outstanding cheques and lodgements shown on bank reconciliations have cleared shortly after the period-end. <strong>(V, E)</strong></p>
    [9] => <p>10.	Where bank accounts have both credit and debit balances relating to the same financial institution, consider and justify whether these figures should be ‘netted off’ or shown gross. <strong>(V)</strong></p>
    [10] => <p>11.	Obtain a bank letter from each bank with which the client has had a relationship during the period.  Agree the account balances and ensure all other matters arising are dealt with. <strong>(P, R & O, E, C, V)</strong></p>

    [11] => <p>12.	Review the cash book and the bank statements around the period-end to ensure that any transfers etc. have been properly reflected in the financial statements. <strong>(C)</strong></p>
    [12] => <p>13.	Review the cash book and bank statements for the period for any unusual receipts or payments. <strong>(E, V)</strong></p>
    [13] => <p>14.	Ensure that any foreign currency balances at the period end have been correctly translated at the period end rate, and ensure there is an adequate accounting policy note. <strong>(V, P)</strong></p>
    [14] => <p>15.	Count petty cash balances and agree to the control account. <strong>(V, C)</strong></p>
    [15] => <p>16.	Obtain written confirmation of material petty cash floats held. <strong>(V)</strong></p>
    [16] => <p>17.	List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>
)
